Here are the things you'll be covering throughout the course
  • API integrations with new software products
  • Rapid prototyping of new product ideas
  • Open source development
  • Expanding and creating new features in existing products

End-of-Course Goals
  • Familiarity with JS based front-end frameworks (Angular, React, Vue, etc.)
  • Proficient in programming languages commonly used in web development
  • Problem solving skills
  • Ability to prioritize features based on impact
  • Bachelor's degree in computer science or a related field
